name: CB FAQ Responsive Accordion
author: Md Abul Bashar

sections.description:
Esay Full Responsive FAQ Accordion, just go to Accordion post, and add new Accordion. and use this shortcode [cb_faq] in any pages or posts. then enjoy it.

  • Documentations: shortcode is [cb_faq].

  • if you want to use in any template just use this code

  • Default view latest 10 post.

  • Show Manually Post Count of 5 post (just add count=”5″). full code cb_faq [cb_faq count=”5″] with third bracket.

  • and support all post type, just use posttype=”your post name”

  • Demo Link: http://www.codingbank.com/plugins/cb-faq-responsive-accordion

  • Our Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/linuxhostlab

  • Our Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/codingbank

Full Documentations

Another Plugin CB Responsive jQuery Accordion

You can watch this video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yahxBNO1N_k
sections.installation:
example:

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  • Documentations: shortcode is [cb_faq].

  • Default view latest 10 post.

  • Show Manually Post Count of 5 post (just add count=”5″). full code cb_faq [cb_faq count=”5″] with third bracket.

  • and support all post type, just use posttype=”your post name”

  • Demo Link: http://www.codingbank.com/plugins/cb-faq-responsive-accordion
sections.faq:
How to Install This Plugin?

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

How to Use This Plugin?

  • just go to faq post, and add new accordion . and use this shortcode [cb_faq] in any pages or posts. then enjoy it.

  • Demo Link: http://www.codingbank.com/plugins/cb-faq-responsive-accordion
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • fixed Hash tag problem.

1.0

  • Just Create New Version.
